prompt.title: Governance of Sentient Oceans
prompt.text: Design a governance system for a society of sentient oceans on a distant planet. Communication is only possible via tidal patterns and bioluminescent displays. The oceans have a collective consciousness but also individual currents with distinct personalities. How can justice, resource allocation, and individual expression be maintained?

exchanges.statement: We're wasting precious time debating perspective_difference when urgent action is needed NOW!
While I respect that perspective, my concern is that rushing could damage the trust and safety we've worked so hard to build.
Every moment we delay is a moment lost - bold action creates the evidence we need through real-world results!
